topic.title: Clean Up
topic.shortdesc: After you have made your tasty meal, be sure to clean up the kitchen utensils that you used for cooking.

body.p: As far as clean up, be sure to place the dishes in the dishwasher. Skillets should be washed by hand as well as spatulas and mixing bowls. After washing the components of appliances by hand, return them to where they were found.
